turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please go pick me up a drink from Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, what type of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm not sure, do you have any suggestions or recommendations?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you currently in the mood for something cold or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a cold beverage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want a coffee based drink or something else, like tea?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Definitely coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like the drink to be sweet?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like something a little bit sweet, but not overly so. Are there drinks similar to that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The iced mochas tend to be a bit sweet, but the iced cordusio is similar but is more bittersweet.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good. Does it have a lot of caffeine?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It has a bit more than a mocha, as it has an extra shot of espresso. Is that what you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that sounds great. What type of milk does it have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It has whole milk, but you can change that if you would like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk is fine, let's stick with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like me to order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a grande size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else? They have food items on their menu as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you, I just want the beverage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I will go pick it up for you now.
